parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if player has Radio enabled.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command exists in Arma 3 but doesn't do much </value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownRadio'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[shownRadio]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "You have Radio enabled."};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showRadio]], [[shownMap]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownUAVFeed]]
</value></part></template>
